Name: Deadly Blue
About the game: In 'Deadly Blue' you play for a plastic badge from the toilet, which was animated by the power of love, but the happiness was short-lived and the cunning cockroach kidnapped your lover. Now you have a long hard way through different dangerous locations full of enemies to save your princess. Use different weapons to fight against the slugs, zombies, robots, punk cockroaches and big bad bosses. Keep your eyes open to find secret places. Features: - 25 levels in 5 different locations - variety of weapons - tough bosses - mini-games - hidden treasures - stylish hats to come fight with style ;)
